text: Thomas Jefferson Jordan (September 5, 1919 - August 26, 2019) was an American professional baseball player. He appeared in 39 major league games over three seasons for the Chicago White Sox (1944; 1946), Cleveland Indians (1946), and the St. Louis Browns (1948). Jordan died at his home in Roswell, New Mexico on August 26, 2019 from heart attack-related problems, aged 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * , or Retrosheet Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: Tom Jordan (baseball)
